alert.note: Alert for Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 09 at 2:50AM CDT until July 09 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR WESTERN OKLAHOMA AND EAST CENTRAL CANADIAN COUNTIES... At 250 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Yukon, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, southwestern Edmond, Del City, Yukon, Bethany, Warr Acres, The Village, Piedmont, Nichols Hills, Valley Brook, Forest Park, Woodlawn Park, Lake Aluma, Smith Village, and Richland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
